sentences.en: an east-facing bedroom
sentences.cn: 朝东的卧室

sentences.en: Eating in East Berlin used to be a hazardous and joyless experience.
sentences.cn: 在东柏林就餐曾经是一件危险而且沉闷无趣的事情。

sentences.en: He had been on safari in East Africa with his son.
sentences.cn: 他曾和他儿子到东非游猎。

sentences.en: He was born in East Jerusalem.
sentences.cn: 他出生在东耶路撒冷。

sentences.en: housing problems in the east
sentences.cn: 东部的住房问题

sentences.en: I don’t know the east coast well.
sentences.cn: 我不太熟悉东海岸。

sentences.en: Middle East peace talks in Washington showed signs of progress yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天在华盛顿举行的中东和谈有了取得进展的迹象。

sentences.en: Middle East peace talks reopen in Washington on Wednesday.
sentences.cn: 中东和平谈判于周三在华盛顿重启。

sentences.en: Mr Cook is intending to go to the Middle East on Friday.
sentences.cn: 库克先生打算周五去中东。

sentences.en: Outside, a bitter east wind was accompanied by flurries of snow.
sentences.cn: 外面，刺骨的东风伴着阵阵小雪。

sentences.en: Pope John Paul received a rapturous reception when he visited East Timor.
sentences.cn: 在访问东帝汶期间，教皇约翰·保罗受到了热烈的欢迎。

sentences.en: She sent her son to a boarding school in the East.
sentences.cn: 她送儿子上了东部的一所寄宿学校。

sentences.en: The agent spied for East Germany for more than twenty years.
sentences.cn: 该特工人员为东德做了20多年的间谍。

sentences.en: The drug is being used all the time out east.
sentences.cn: 这药一直在东方使用。

sentences.en: The move represents a setback for the Middle East peace process.
sentences.cn: 这个行动意味着中东和平进程受挫。

sentences.en: The real danger is civil unrest in the east of the country.
sentences.cn: 真正的危险是该国东部地区的民众动乱。

sentences.en: The river widens considerably as it begins to turn east.
sentences.cn: 河流转向东流时河道大幅度变宽。

sentences.en: This message caused perturbation in the Middle East Headquarters.
sentences.cn: 这则消息在中东总部引起了不安。

sentences.en: We drove east along Brooklyn Avenue.
sentences.cn: 我们沿布鲁克林大街往东行驶。

sentences.en: We drove east to Rostock, where my map led me astray.
sentences.cn: 我们驱车向东去罗斯托克，但地图却给我指错了方向。

sentences.en: Which way is east?
sentences.cn: 哪边是东？

sentences.en: Willy Brandt made history by visiting East Germany in 1970.
sentences.cn: 威利·勃兰特1970年访问东德，书写了历史新篇章。

words.tran_cn: 东方人；（美国）东部地区的人
东方人；居住在东部或东方的人
东方的；向东的；从东方来的

phrases.tran_cn: 东印度（指印度，印度支那半岛，马来半岛和马来群岛等）
东河（美国纽约州东南部的海峡，位于曼哈顿岛与长岛之间）
东帝汶（位于东南亚，曾是葡萄牙殖民地）
东村（在美国纽约市曼哈顿）
n. （前面与the连用）远东（西方国家对亚洲最东部地区的称呼）
中东（一般泛指欧，亚，非三大洲连接的地区）

trans.tran_cn: 东部的，朝东的，东方的，东风的
trans.tran_en: in the east or facing the east
the direction from which the sun rises, and which is on the right if you are facing north
